articles.title: Susanna Reid's body language is 'self-diminishing' with 'confrontational' Piers Morgan - Express
articles.description: PIERS MORGAN, 55, and Susanna Reid, 49, are co-presenters on ITV's Good Morning Britain. The pair have shared the role for five years. What does their body language reveal?
